text:
In the example below, the two <text> elements should be displayed at the
same position. They are not in Batik 1.1rc3:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 20010904//EN" 
"http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-SVG-20010904/DTD/svg10.dtd">
<svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 843 578">
	<text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 -270 242.4) translate(495,194.28)" 
class="reddish" style="text-anchor:middle">Simple</text>
	<text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 -270 242.4)" class="reddish" 
style="text-anchor:middle">
	<tspan x="495" y="194.28">Complicated</tspan></text>
</svg>
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
